questions.text:
This survey tool takes only a few minutes to use. Its purpose is to help you apply former skills as well as new awareness to your current or upcoming written work.

[Survey Type: 2]

Please describe in as much detail as possible your most important current or upcoming academic writing task in the course for which you’re using this app (e.g., argumentative essay, lab report, opinion piece).
Rate the importance, if any, of the following skill to your previously identified current or upcoming academic writing task: {{MULTI}}

parts.hover: e.g., knowing when to argue, analyze, describe, etc.; using a central idea in a paper; providing logical transitions between sections
e.g., responding to feedback from others about the content of your drafts
e.g., researching a topic, developing an argument, and organizing appropriate evidence and relevant supporting details
i.e., effectively and coherently incorporating appropriate evidence and relevant research into your writing
i.e., understanding how meaning is made, and how and why it is communicated
i.e., using appropriate strategies and style to achieve your desired effect
e.g., identifying and correcting grammatical errors
i.e., clarifying to yourself and to readers what your intentions are and why they're relevant

parts.text: Working effectively and appropriately with various media
parts.hover: e.g., researching and composing in appropriate modes, such as alphabetic, visual, audio

questions.text: Rate the importance, if any, of the following habit of mind to your current or upcoming academic writing task in the course for which you’re using this app, as you see it: {{MULTI}}

parts.hover: The desire to know more about the world
Taking ownership of one’s actions and understanding the consequences of those actions for oneself and others
Adapting to situations, expectations, or demands
A sense of investment involvement in learning
Willingness to consider new ways of being and thinking in the world
Using new approaches to generate, investigate, and represent ideas
Sustaining interest in and attention to short- and long-term projects
The ability to reflect on one’s own thinking as well as on the individual and cultural processes used to structure knowledge

questions.text: How helpful to you, if at all, have been this app’s reminders to transfer your writing skills, knowledge, and habits of mind to your current or upcoming academic writing task in the course for which you’re using this app?
